Package de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control.commands

This package contains all command types, subclasses of AbstractCommand like SetSensorCommand.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCommand
    The base class for commands.
    ButtonClick
    Command class for signaling button clicks
    ChangeSensorSensitivity
    Command used for notifying the server of changed sensitivity requirements
    ConnectionAliveCheck
    This command is used to check the connection, by requiring an answer to be sent if it is received
    ConnectionRequest
    Signifies a connection request by a client device to a server.
    ConnectionRequestResponse
    This command is sent as an answer to ConnectionRequest commands, to notify of the decision to accept the client (or not).
    DisplayNotification
    This command may be used by the server to request the display of a notification.
    EndConnection
    Signal an unilateral connection close
    HideReset
    Command class for hiding the reset button in SendActivity
    RemapPorts
    This command is sent when the server detects command messages from client A on the port destined for client B.
    ResetToCenter
    This command is to be used for resetting the phone position, whatever that means for an application.
    SensorDescription
    This commands is responsible for displaying information about the sensor usage
    SensorRangeNotification
    This command is sent by the app to inform the server about the range of a sensor, which is necessary to normalize data
    SetSensorCommand
    This command may be used to switch sensors on or off
    SetSensorSpeed
    Command for changing the requested speed of a sensor, e.g.
    UpdateButtonsMap
    This command is used for setting the buttons displayed in the app via a mapping of psychic button ids and button texts.
    UpdateButtonsXML
    This command is used to set the buttons displayed in the app using a subset of allowed android layout resource files.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommandType
    This enum is used to identify commands.
    SetSensorSpeed.SensorSpeed
    These are the sensor speeds made available by the android framework.

Package de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control.commands Description

This package contains all command types, subclasses of AbstractCommand like SetSensorCommand. Commands are identified by their CommandType member function AbstractCommand.getCommandType() so they can be easily cast to the respective subclass.
